SEARCH
Package org.infinispan.commons.tx

Interface TransactionResourceConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultResourceConverter, InvocationHelper
public interface TransactionResourceConverter
Converts Synchronization and XAResource to AsyncSynchronization and AsyncXaResource.
Since:
14.0
